trends: There have been no other sightings in Chidlow
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was having a conversation out on the porch having a chat when my friend pointed out what she thought to be a comet\ shooting star but once it moved at a remarkable rate it seemed to gain altitude in a steady fluid motion. the object, i felt as if the object that i saw, i could see the doppler effect in motion. the object was made up of 4 balls\ orbs in a linear pattern. the object was fairly large at 6 inches from my eyes. this was the trail of the object. it then sped off into the distance a became a "star" before no longer becoming visible. it simply no longer was there. i wish to inform you that i have once before filed a report many years ago and that my claims are genuine and true if you deem my sighting to be of terrestrial origin i am fine with that finding.
Summary: the object originally was believed to be a comet however there was no scheduled comet. the object was NOT a Comet or Asteroid
